title: Claire Makes Potato Gratin | Bon Appétit
description:
Our potato gratin has layers of starchy, cheesy, buttery goodness. Fire this dish up at any holiday meal and you'll have guests drooling. A layer of Gruyère and Parmesan is the key to a golden brown top crust. When simmering the cream, make sure it’s over gentle heat (if it over-reduces, it will break). Get the recipe: http://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/classic-potato-gratin
